Vinícius de Maria Gadotti

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4974646681296451
  • Última atualização do currículo em 07/09/2017

My research focuses on behavior and molecular pharmacology of pain and by the use of optogenetics technique, I try to understand how pain happens in a molecular level as well as how proteins involved in pain signaling are regulated and how they contribute to electrical signals responsible for pain transmission in the live animal. I also try to identify brain circuits involved in pain processing and brain connections and circuits responsible for depression and anxiety. Then, discovering new mechanisms responsible for the genesis of diseases allow us to produce new molecules that improve our ability to treat patients and prevent the economic burden to society related to the high cost of treatment of chronic diseases. (Texto informado pelo autor)
